product_name: The North Face Pickford Rolltop Daypack
long_description: With an urban, roll-top design and skateboard-friendly straps, The North Face Pickford Rolltop daypack stashes a day's worth of gear and expands to hold even more when you can't leave anything behind. Padded shoulder straps; spine channel for breathability. Main compartment with organizational features houses a 15-in. laptop compartment with a zippered side entry, so you can access your laptop or tablet without unpacking your bag. Waterproof zippers and durable twill fabric with a waterproof coating help keep your gear dry during your daily commute. When you reach your final destination, lash your skateboard to the front using the adjustable compression straps.
short_description: With an urban, roll-top design and skateboard-friendly straps, The North Face Pickford Rolltop daypack stashes a day's worth of gear and expands to hold even more when you can't leave anything behind.
